sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Box, Typography, Paper, Card, CardContent, Chip, Timeline, TimelineItem, TimelineSeparator, TimelineConnector, TimelineContent, TimelineDot, TimelineOppositeContent, } from '@mui/material'; import MicIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Mic'; import ImageIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Image'; import DescriptionIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Description'; import ChatIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Chat'; function History() { // Sample history data const historyData = [ { date: '2025-10-18', time: '14:30', type: 'Voice Analysis', icon: , symptoms: ['headache', 'fever', 'fatigue'], result: 'Possible Flu - Moderate severity', color: 'primary', }, { date: '2025-10-17', time: '10:15', type: 'Image Diagnosis', icon: , result: 'X-ray analysis completed - No abnormalities detected', color: 'success', }, { date: '2025-10-15', time: '16:45', type: 'Prescription OCR', icon: , medicines: ['Paracetamol', 'Amoxicillin', 'Vitamin C'], result: 'Prescription extracted successfully', color: 'warning', }, { date: '2025-10-14', time: '09:20', type: 'Chatbot Consultation', icon: , topic: 'Diabetes management advice', result: 'General health guidance provided', color: 'secondary', }, { date: '2025-10-12', time: '11:00', type: 'Voice Analysis', icon: , symptoms: ['cough', 'sore throat'], result: 'Possible Common Cold - Mild severity', color: 'primary', }, ]; return ( üìã Consultation History View your previous medical consultations and assessments. üìä Total Consultations: {historyData.length} üìÖ Date Range: Oct 12 - Oct 18, 2025 {historyData.map((item, index) => ( {item.date} {item.time} {item.icon} {index < historyData.length - 1 && } {item.type} {item.symptoms && ( Symptoms: {item.symptoms.map((symptom, idx) => ( ))} )} {item.medicines && ( Medicines: {item.medicines.map((medicine, idx) => ( ))} )} {item.topic && ( Topic: {item.topic} )} {item.result} ))} üìù Note This is a demonstration of how consultation history would be displayed. In a production system, this would be connected to a database storing actual user consultations with proper authentication and data privacy measures. ); } export default History;
